name: The Journey to Fairytales
description:
Main:
The Journey to Fairytales is a puzzle-platformer adventure game. The primary character is a Sam, who was stolen by Baga-Yaga to the world of fairy tales. It is necessary to help him to escape from her and save the rest of the children from evil characters. And at the end of the game to defeat the Wizard.

Fairyland- is the land of the fairytales, many of them on the side of good, but some of them wants to take over the world, who managed by Wizard!

Gameplay:
The game is not as simple as it may seem! There will be as little as possible of murder and violence, for the most part the opponents need to be outwitted or deceived. And what kind of quest platformer without puzzles? Of course - no way! From the first minutes you will to find the way out from, at first glance, deadlock situation! And the story gets better! Climb the world, solve puzzles, secrets, defeat enemies in mini-games, control the mini robots, and much more!

Features:
  • More than 30 kinds of various puzzles that require not only logic, but also mindfulness
  • More than 20 kinds of enemies, who diverse in their motivations and conduct
  • 8 different locations, each of which has unique traps and secrets
  • 6 mini-games that are part of the game world
  • Much more
